user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to Boston next year and I want to explore the city's basketball history. Can you provide me with the roster and schedule of the Boston Celtics for the year 2008? Also, give me the latest news about Formula 1 from all sources.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the roster of the Boston Celtics for the year 2008.
Retrieve the schedule of the Boston Celtics for the year 2008.
Fetch the latest news about Formula 1 from all sources.
